definition: to renew a certificate (ID card etc)/to leave an ID at the desk to gain entrance
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: This exhibition is only for related industries.
sentences.chinese: 本次展览只提供给相关业者做换证。

sentences.english: Please go to the front desk to get your badges.
sentences.chinese: 需要换证者，麻烦请往前方的柜台。

sentences.english: This paper is used only for applying for inspection or certificate-change of directly exported commodities.
sentences.chinese: 此单仅用于直发出口商品的检验或换证申报。

sentences.english: Transition can be done during any scheduled periodical or re-certification audit in the 24 months period.
sentences.chinese: 转换可在24月的周期内任何定期或换证审核中进行。

sentences.english: Buyers (Factory owners) please go to another entrance to get your badge.
sentences.chinese: 麻烦请到另一个出入口换证。

sentences.english: All of the routine certificate renewal inspection fee should be paid before the inspection.
sentences.chinese: 例行检查换证费用在检查前一次性付清。

definition: DMV (department of motor vehicles) (abbr. for 公安局交通管理局車輛管理所|公安局交通管理局车辆管理所)

pinyin: Chu1 ru4 Jing4 Guan3 li3 ju2
